alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 4:41AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Livingston County through 515 AM CDT... At 440 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minonk, or 17 miles west of Pontiac, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pontiac, Fairbury, Gridley, Forrest, Flanagan, Odell and Cornell. Including the following interstate... I-55 between mile markers 188 and 215. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
